release_note: Fixed: In the recent iteration it was found that in the iPad version the height of the input fields in the interfaces for creating a new document and renaming documents is insufficient. Fixed: The Tags add remove interface introduced some new bugs in the recent version update. Fixed: The logic that keeping vertical center position while typing which caused potential cursor displacement jitter. Fixed: Resolved the issue where multiple clicks are required for the Zen mode background to take effect on the desktop version. New: Added support for selecting font for PDF exporting on the desktop version. Fixed: ghosting when rendering the contents of the file manager in the latest OS. Fixed: the problem caused by the previous versions incorrect cursor position offsets in code highlighting and in the Meta window. Tweak: Since Metion 3.5 has been released for a long time we have adjusted the logic of synchronizing and replacing old versions of documents. If the old version of a document does not have the mdate attribute it will be compared with the modification time of the local document to determine the mdate value so that the document can be synchronized with the documents after version 3.5 automatically without being placed in the historical version again. Tweak: iPad version displays the header when cursor moves to item and it is hidden. Optimize: Logic of screen auto lock Tweak: When restoring a document version the mdate field will be modified at the same time to avoid being automatically overwritten by an unintended version later than the restored version during synchronization. Other bugs fixed

If the old version of a document does not have the mdate attribute it will be compared with the modification time of the local document to determine the mdate value so that the document can be synchronized with the documents after version 3.5 automatically without being placed in the historical version again. Optimize: Logic of screen auto lock Tweak: When restoring a document version the mdate field will be modified at the same time to avoid being automatically overwritten by an unintended version later than the restored version during synchronization. Fixed: Adopted new merge processing logic for Metadata to keep the different formats of Metadata as compatible as possible. Fixed: Compatibility with new iPadOS versions avoiding the situation where setting items have no effect after tapping on them Optimize: Logic of screen auto lock Tweak: When restoring a document version the mdate fiel d will be modified at the same time to avoid being automatically overwritten by an unintended version later than the restored version during synchronization. Other bugs fixed

Fixed: Adopted new merge processing logic for Metadata to keep the different formats of Metadata as compatible as possible. Tweak: When restoring a document version the mdate field will be modified at the same time to avoid being automatically overwritten by an unintended version later than the restored version during synchronization. Other bugs fixed

Fixed: a little more text and with the separator lines inserted a potential performance problem in the text rendering engine which will lead to a laggy feeling if typping new words. New: in iCloud related menu you can uncheck Show Alert even if the App detected a connectivity problem in iCloud sync it will not make pop up reminders to avoid interference. Tweak: remove the turn on automatically feature for reader mode to avoid potential confusion with editing mode. Tweak: Auto populate doc_id into metadata when saving a document so that if iClo ud Drive automatically copies a document due to an unavoidable version conflict Metion automatically removes duplicate redundancy based on the doc_id. Tweak: calculate automatic position scrolling in some writing modes without using UI animations to avoid potential position jitter. Fixed: fit the checkbox position offset and try to keep the cursor position when list item toggle into todo item. Other bugs fixed

Fixed: Continue to improve typewriter writing mode Fixed: Customize Y offset in typewriter mode iOS to avoid conflicts with keeping the cursor visible during text inputing Fixed: Move To command window not displaying Enhancement: Continued enhancements iCloud synchronization Tweaks: Fine tuning of the document list interface and repositioning of the arrows of the folder context menu window Other bugs fixed

Fixed: the background image is not displayed in Zen mode on iOS Fixed: Optimized the typewriter writing mode for iPad and iPhone to avoid unnecessary scrolling. Fixed: Compatibility adjustments for Widgets in the latest OS. Fixed: Customized the desktop pop up menu to correspond OS 12 14 avoiding backward compatibility issues when corresponding to the latest OS. Adjustment: Fine tuned the layout of the document list interface. Other fixes and adjustments.

Fixed: 3.5.7 performance issue if autohide Markdown syntax enabled when dealing some Markdown structure text writing there will be a stuttering situation. Fixed: Incorrect position of search bar especially when there is a preview column. Fixed: Git related ICONs in the library list don t change when the theme changed. Adjust: Adjust the preloading logic of some interfaces to reduce unnecessary preloading. Others fixes
Compatible with the latest version of OS Optimizations related to iCloud sync and adding the display of iCloud Status. Many other details have been fixed.

Fixed: The case that the content in the Metadata window is not saved successfully. Fixed: PDF export can not be saved if the file name contains non English characters. Fixed: iPad version of the line breaks may produce half of the screen scrolling automatically. Adjustment: iPad version of the Option R shortcut is invalid adjusted to Control R Many other details have been fixed.

Fixed: The case that the content in the Metadata window is not saved successfully. Fixed: PDF export can not be saved if the file name contains non English characters. Fixed: iPad version of the line breaks may produce half of the screen scrolling automatically. Adjustment: iPad version of the Option R shortcut is invalid adjusted to Control R Many other details have been fixed.

Rewrote the Mac native version of Metion which has the same features and experience as the iOS version. Incorporates CloudKit with iCloud Drive or Git to improve the speed and stability of cross devices synchronization. Enhanced the Tags feature which can be set through the interface rather than text syntax and the Tags Tree that complements the file manager. e right state. Many other details have been fixed.

Fixed: typing in Meta popups will be refocused into core text body Optimize: minimize unnecessary autoscrolling logic in typewriter mode Optimize: On iPad version when connecting a keyboard ensure that the body is in editing state before the title when the Enter key is pressed down. Optimize: After disabling the display of shortcut keys pressing and holding the Command key by mistake will attempt to automatically return to editing state after releasing the Command key. Optimize: Add Move support to the right click menu of folders and documents. Optimize: Adjust the comparison algorithm of old and new versions during synchronization to reduce performance loss during synchronization comparison. Optimize: Speed up the synchronization of images contained in the article currently being edited when synchronizing across devices. Enhance: Long pressing an item in the workspace directory list can now be sorted. New: Added support for Special Fonts in the settings which can be used for custom fonts when exporting PDFs or images. Note that this feature may be limited by the system at runtime use it as needed. Other details are adjusted and fixed Note: Metion 3.0 uses a new synchronization mechanism which in simple terms adds real time modification mdate to the header Meta information to ensure the reliability of syncing content merging as much as possible through iCloud. If you are using Metion 2.0 such as the old iOS version or the Mac version to edit content it is unlikely to be merged into Metion 3.0 but the data should have been synced normally. In this case you can refer to the following methods: 1. The document is stored as a historical version and you can restore it yourself in the historical version to sync it. 2. You can also manually declare mdate in the Mac version so that the latest content can be automatically merged after syncing which is the same as the default date format Meta . 3. Synchronization through Git is not affected. The new Metion 3.0 the biggest change since the birth of Metion. A better looking interface a more natural interaction logic further optimization for iPadOS and likewise a more iPhone compliant form on the iPhone. We ve rewritten almost all of the interface and in addition to that the underlying data logic is better. For example the new syncing mechanism which it should be noted will only be used for articles edited by the new version of Metion others will be saved as history versions and not automatically merged by syncing. Due to the large number of changes we have already caught and fixed many bugs but in the early days of Metion 3.0 there are still many omissions. We look forward to understanding and giving us feedback so that we can make quick fixes in our regular iterations. Thanks. :

Some bugs and crash cases are fixed

Fixed: Git based working directory image attachments were synced to iCloud Enhancement: Git auto sync logic Enhancement: change the audio to text recognition policy to best . Enhancement: fine tuned the keyboard shortcut bar to have as many visible areas as possible for different phone models Enhancement: preview popover for math formulas on iPad with down arrow as possible Fixed: the message style when saving as image Some other bugs and crash cases are fixed

New: font size settings for exporting PDF Enhancement: Some compatibility handling for iPad multi windows Fixed: when compile Markdown a paragraph that embeds pure html may cuase error Enhancement: compatible to newest OS version Some other bugs and flashing cases are fixed
Enhancement: compatible to newest OS version Fixed: a local database related bug will cause App crash Some other bugs and flashing cases are fixed
Fixed: a local database related bug will cause App crash Some other bugs and flashing cases are fixed
Some other bugs and flashing cases are fixed

Updates for Current Version Enhancement: Context menu for on working directory list will be automatically hidden during interface scrolling Fixed: Wiki Graph II is displayed incorrectly in the newest OS Some other bugs and flashing cases are fixed
Updates for Current Version Enhancement: highlighting the keyword when searching documents Some other bugs and flashing cases are fixed

Updates for Current Version New: Added some white noise background music in Zen mode New: Support for word count statistics for folders Enhancement: Some rule improvements for syntax highlighting Some other bugs and flashing cases are fixed

Updates for Current Version Enhancement: The interface of New Working Directory has been redesigned. Enhancement: Changed the data synchronization mechanism documents are first stored as historical versions instead of directly overwritten increasing user control including the synchronization behavior generated by iCloud and Git. Enhancement: The whole app was redesigned and adjusted for iOS and iPadOS. Enhancement: Rewrote the interface for creating and renaming folders and files to make it better and more user friendly and enhanced the keyboard support in the interface. New: New shortcut bar area most operations in the app can be quickly found here. New: New Zen Mode white noises for both Standard and Pro. Enhancement: context menu added for currently selected objects on folder and document list Enhancement: Re adjusted and optimized the distribution of each menu in the App New: On iPad you can keep the left document list bar always there no more overlay New: Initially added support for 25 localized languages Enhancement: Many other fine tuning such as the version history window can be closed by pulling down the fine tuning of the Zen mode for CJK the adjustment of some prompt messages and the optimization of the mechanism .etc Some other bugs and flashing cases are fixed

Updates for Current Version Fixed: Image syntax information is lost when save current article which has many more image in it Enhancement: Markdown parsing logic for colon figure Fixed: Confusing syntax highlighting for multiple links with in same line Adjust: logic of Drag and drop image to insert on iOS Fixed some other bugs and crash situations

Updates for Current Version Adjust: Change the position of popover for the preview of Mathjax formulas Fixed: Layout of Work Folder List issue for iPhone X and others with the same screen width Fixed: Another enhancement for Restore Purchase under macOS Fixed some other bugs and crash situations

Updates for Current Version FIXED: When querying backlinks there may be cases of unmatched documents. Fixed: Another enhancement for Restore Purchase under macOS Fixed some other bugs and crash situations

Updates for Current Version New: In the list of Work Folder new Files Information for right click context menu you can see the total count of files and occupied space related to posts pictures and videos in the current Work Folder. New: Add some clear files related actions under the File Manager related menu in the Settings Panel please use it carefully. Fixed: When the selected text contains images the content converted to text does not correctly escape the path of the images Tweak: Adjust the notification after successful Git Push in iOS version Fixed some other bugs and crash situations

Updates for Current Version Adjust: The mechanism of Restore Purchase is adjusted the communication time with Apple s server has become much longer try to reduce the probability of problems. New: Customize the content template for new documents iPadOS macOS to be visible on the right click menu. Tweak: CSS style for preview support letter spacing from Settings Panel Tweak: Git sync does not alert you of content changes when writing in Zen mode Fixed some other bugs and crash situations

Updates for Current Version New: iOS iPadOS add support for automatically locking the app and unlocking it with FaceID and TouchID New: iOS iPadOS Share selected text as card . Adjusted: iOS iPadOS new interface of working directory list Tweak: iPadOS when text is selected and keyboard is connected it can be in scrolling state Fixed: A logical fix in Markdown parsing to avoid unnecessary in line elements line breaks. Fixed some other bugs and crash situations

Updates for Current Version FIXED: Text to Mindmap may cause duplicate Header if empty content under related Header FIXED: Multiple wiki style link syntax in the same line compiled error FIXED: Export Image as Simple theme was re styled for article which does not start with a Header Fixed: Metion for Mac changed the alert style notification now after a successful Git Push Fixed some other bugs and crash situations

Updates for Current Version Fixed: PDF export for iOS version may fail Fixed: Centered writing mode on iPad may have scrolled to the bottom in some cases Fixed: Git syncing does not sync the sorting of documents and folders Adjustment: When creating a new document if current is in reading mode exit reading mode first. Enhancement: When opening a document if it is synced through iCloud will ask whether to restore the latest history version if 200 more words than current document. Fixed some other bugs and crash situations.

Updates for Current Version Bug Fixed: Under Big Sur the presence of input area would cause the interface to be stuck and the memory to be burst mainly manifested by renaming panels and searching panels. Enhancement: Mac version of Reading Mode supports right click menu. Enhancement: Add Copy and Select All commands to the right click menu of the preview area in Mac version. Bug Fixed: The window can be moved when dragging the top of the preview area in Mac version. Bug Fixed: The order of Markdown footnote syntax is reversed after compiled. Bug Fixed: The judgment of auto hide syntax markdown has a very low probability of crash. Fixed some other bugs and crash situations.

Thank you very much : This update New: rudimentary support for URL Schemes Enhancement: Auto completion of ordered list syntax including parent child level Fixed: if preview is open before entering Read Mode it will cause interface mismatch. Updates for Current Version Since Metion 2.0 has just been released it will take a few minor releases in recent days. Fixed: A crash bug related to webview New: Can change language in the settings panel Added: Avoid Markdown Document Overwritten by Cloud option in the settings panel under File Manager . Fixed: Crash caused by the command of Reveal in Finder on Mac version The Arrival of Metion 2.0 This is a major iteration of Metion from 1.0 to 2.0. In addition Metion for Mac has also been improved a lot in 2.0 since the last rewrite natively version and it is basically shared the same features on iOS iPadOS. Metion 2.0 is not just improved it also adds a new sync method that by Git and an extremely important new feature named Knowledge Base . This release has taken a very long time to develop so please let us know if you encounter any problems. Thank you : New Features Knowledge Base that connected by tags bidirectional links browsing mode includes Mindmap and Network Built in Git as a more robust syncing tool not just using iCloud Drive to sync Simple Todo List todo items in the Todo syntax in any documents will eventually be automatically grouped On iPadOS split screen is supported and the document at one screen will be automatically opened if the other one is in mindmap mode of knowledge base In the Settings Panel today s quick note can select a Work Folder Wiki syntax for auto completion of auto document links New support for red:text syntax to mark color for text New syntax for related to automatically display a list of related documents when rendering HTML Tweaks and Enhancements Three types of Work Folder: directly based on iCloud Git and mounted external directories Add some tips and information to alert such as when the Work Folder is located in iCloud Drive When document content is modified by other Apps or devices ask whether to reload or not more cautious operation steps to reload content The logic of Tags in File Manager is deprecated and moved to the mindmap mode of Knowlege Base Enhance some processing rules for bi directional storage based on iCloud Drive If the syntax of the link is a local audio or video file it will be parsed as a playable HTML Dom element. On macOS add the logic of Previous and Next to open related documents in the File menu On macOS add the font customization of File Manager Add support for Recent Documents Histories on macOS Enhance some syntax auto completion rules Bug fixes FIXED: When there is an image in document it may cause the text of the image to be stored incorrectly when it is finally saved. FIXED: Writing Statistics did not work properly on iOS after the last version update. FIXED: Upward jumping of footnotes did not work after Markdown parsing. FIXED: Table syntax of Github Flavored Markdown was not compiled correctly. FIXED: If the path of an image starts with and is sycning back from iCloud it will not sync to the local device. FIXED: When toggle Preview on iPad images in document may be out of proportion if they are resized due to interface animation and similarly on macOS. FIXED: Reload the help documents because of bi directional storage the old documents will be synced back from iCloud. FIXED: Command D when toggling to undo state the timestamp was not removed automatically. FIXED: Markdown syntax shortcuts were not working in Zen mode on macOS. Other details and bug fixes

The main updates: Enhancement: Wiki style link syntax support check the App built in Help Enhancement: Wiki style link syntax can be automatically embed the content of linked documents check the App s built in Help Fixed: App Crash when try to change the PDF exporting theme Fixed: When toggle Markdown Preview on iPad because of the interface animation images in the article may be in the incorrect size New: Add size information when display the files in TrashBox Adjusted: The mechanism of opening large text changed asks and does not highlight but does not prevent opening anymore Enhancement: Focus Writing Mode implementation tweaked to improve performance and avoid some potential conflicts Fix: If the exported PDF contains a Table converted to a chart which is not displayed

The main updates: Enhancement: Wiki style link syntax support check the App built in Help Enhancement: Wiki style link syntax can be automatically embed the content of linked documents check the App s built in Help Fixed: App Crash when try to change the PDF exporting theme Fixed: When toggle Markdown Preview on iPad because of the interface animation images in the article may be in the incorrect size New: Add size information when display the files in TrashBox Adjusted: The mechanism of opening large text changed asks and does not highlight but does not prevent opening anymore Enhancement: Focus Writing Mode implementation tweaked to improve performance and avoid some potential conflicts Fix: If the exported PDF contains a Table converted to a chart which is not displayed

An important version release for Metion This is a very significant update to Metion since its first launch and has taken a very long time to develop but bugs may still be there so please let us know if you encounter any problems. In addition we are optimistic that the real Mac version of Metion will be released in May but if that doesn t work out we think we can finish this first release in June. Important storage and synchronization adjustments For a more robust data and experience the new Metion uses a dual storage mechanism of Local iCloud . iCloud Drive is only used as a synchronization tool. The old user will have a data migration after updating to the new Metion copying data from the iCloud side to the local side. If there are too much iCloud documents not synced to the local side the subsequent use of Metion will also automatically complete the sync. But because the iCloud sync mechanism is OS controlled it may require Waiting Patiently ...... Due to the mechanism of iCloud Drive itself Metion may not be able to complete cross devices synchronization in time and the dual storage mechanism of Local iCLoud will lead to some old data duplication requiring users to perform repeated operations mainly delete move rename operations on different devices this is a probabilistic issue that generally does not occur and even if it does it is acceptable considering the stability of the data. If you need to use Metion s original mechanism of using iCloud Drive as the only storage directory please use a directory on iCloud as the external work folder for Metion a new feature of Metion . New Features Redesign for the Settings Panel Support for automatic parsing of unordered and ordered lists for conversion of Mindmap Optimization of custom shortcuts and interface support for custom sorting Support iPad Touchpad New Directory and New Document operations on the folder list when right click Expanded table syntax cell merge effect Wiki style document link syntax Support for searching across working directories when searching for documents in full text if the keyword starts with Create external work folder mounting in working directories list Support for moving work folder to under another work folder as a normal subdirectory Support moving ordinary subdirectories to the root storage directory of the whole App to become work folder . Add Word count statistics in the top menu Add a new setting to allow or not allow the use of content templates when creating new documents Adjustments The Trashbox is moved to the Settings Panel and the button of creating directory is moved from the top to the bottom. Adjusted the default shortcut bar iPhone side added parenthesis exclamation mark vertical line separator In link related syntax use iOS standard interaction to handle open document and open URL operations when current text is selected When saving the history version if the content is the same as the last version it will not be recorded repeatedly Switching between visual themes using a lighter popover interaction Adjust the startup mechanism if the document crashes during startup the next startup will avoid loading the document. Bug Fixed In the reference syntax block the link related syntax is not clickable Text was not stored in some cases in focus writing mode When exporting as a Mindmap if the page width is too large it will be displayed as a blank page The document list is not refreshed when the document restored from the Trashbox belongs to the currently selected directory If there are Tags in the directory list the last position for new folder is fixed to the penultimate position

In this new release Metion and FarBox 2.0 not publicly released yet have produced an initial convergence that will be a very impressive milestone from a future perspective. FarBox 2.0 has the talent to give Metion a website building blog writing and even a basic web side writing environment. The other contents of current update: Fixed: Avoid unintended screen scrolling by swiping when text is selected Fixed: When opening a Metion document directly from within Files clicking Cancel would cause the document to be deleted. Fixed: Some other details and flashing issues were fixed.

Here we are in 2021 and as always we embrace Metion with enthusiasm. There is a lot of content in this update which has relatively affected the development progress of the Mac version but there is a little bit of prototype already. Major updates this time: Added: Inserting multiple images on iOS 14 Added: Recent Documents History Versions stored on local devices multiple guarantees in case of iCloud issues Adjust: file manager font size tuning and other interface tuning Adjustment: A default parameter adjustment for document saving to preserve the original creation time of the document Adjust: Today Quick Note fixed directory rule if Work Folder ends with or named Diary Added: Folder List can set ICON by swiping to the right Added: Work Folder s cover can be directly selected Adjustment: Pre check whether the corresponding document path exists when getting Tag data Fixed: other details and crash issues fixed Note: Since multiple images inserting is a new feature in iOS 14 to avoid potential system problems you can also disable this feature in the Settings of Metion if you encounter problems.

This is the last update for 2020 or may be the first one for 2021... Previous updates have tweaked some details but causing worse writing experience in some cases on iPad specially when connected with keyboard. Current update mainly focuses on that. The main contents of current update: Fixed: Auto completion of list syntax causing application to die in certain cases Fixed: under keep center writing mode the current line may not kept in center sometimes Fixed: crash issue in early iOS 14.0 beta version Added: option to allow MathJax support to be enabled or not enabled Adjustment: The first time you enter the Work Folder a brief explanation prompt will be given Fixed: Default created file date populated with minutes is incorrect Fixed: other details and crash issues fixed

Maybe this is the last update for the year 2020 and we will continue to focus on the new development of Metion for Mac as well as the continuous improvement of Metion for iOS iPadOS. The main contents of this update: New ICON: The default App ICON for Metion has been changed to a black background or you can re select it to the white one from the Settings Panel New Feature: Add Today Quick Notes as a home screen quick action Improved: Document metadata changes are not refreshed in time for the document list visual Improved: When a document is renamed the title metadata provided by default is automatically replaced if necessary Improved: Under focus mode operation for line number bar or syntax marker bar will be reminded that it is not allowed Fixed: When under focus mode some content changes to the scene were ignored Fixed: The light and dark mode for Setting Panel is adapted to the current visual theme Tweak: Change the auto scrolling logic when it becomes invisible during text input from center to partial bottom Tweak: Adjust the initial logic on iPad for first running to avoid some situations that cause some buttons can t be operated on some devices or some OS versions

Metion received an official Best in November and 新鲜 App recommendation from Apple of China Market when it lauched just for days. Next in addition to continuing to fix some bugs we will focus on the development of native Metion for Mac. The main contents of current update: Added Copy as Rich Text support You can set the preview to be two columns or a independent window on the iPad Zen mode can display the words count Add two buttons on shortcut bar: Tab Current Date Fixed: Customed shortcut bar sorted content could not be saved Added support to delete all history versions of a document Improvement of other details

Metion is still offering a 50 discount for the first launch and recently received an official Best in November and 新鲜 App recommendation from Apple of China Market. The discount release will expire on December 12th. The main contents of this update: Font selection support A quick selection of recently opened documents User can customize keyboard shortcuts on the system built in keyboard When the iPad s horizontal and vertical screen changes File Manager may blink Other issues fixed

Metion is still offering a 50 discount for the first launch and recently received an official Best in November and 新鲜 App recommendation from Apple of China Market.We ve submitted the Catalyst based Mac version to the App Store for approval and hopefully we ll see it soon. If it s an M1 MacBook you can download the iPad version of Metion directly. There are a lot of updates this time. If you encounter any problems in the subsequent use please contact us. : Adaptation of the head menu for the iPhone 12 Mini When exporting images you can choose whether to indent 2em for line or not. The Markdown parsing logic of keep the space before the line also works when exporting the image New folder document insert position is head or tail can be set in the Settings Panel Fixed a bug in the folder list that caused crash when moving to the last position Fixed a situation on iPhone that made it can not to wipe left to the file manager Supports inserting images pasted via Handoff into articles Fixed the file list not being updated after the document was renamed Support for right click support in File Manager when the trackpad such like Magic Keyboard is connected Fixed a situation where the New Folder window accidentally popped up in the working directory list view Inserting images by pasting causes the markup and line lines number not to update the layout in time Fixed: continuous images appearing in the article would cause the descriptions in the following images not to be displayed Adjustment: The focus mode does not show the number of rows column

Metion is still offering a 50 discount for the first launch and recently received an official 新鲜 App recommendation from Apple of China Market. Fixed the default loading of articles containing images not being displayed when the App starts up Soft keyboard shortcut bar for iPad tweaks Automatically hides the file manager when the iPad connects to the keyboard Show notification when history versions of document needs to being synced from iCloud Lots of other tweaks and bug fixes
After entering the Setting Panel with the iPad Pro s Magic Keyboard it will not get stuck after scrolling any more. And some other adjustments and improvements.
New support for QCloud Cos cloud storage that can convert local images to a web remote url.

Notification if current documents list is syncing from iCloud Notification if images in the article syncing from iCloud Fix: maybe fail to return to the file manager interface on the iPhone Some other details such like drag and drop logic

New Features Can share Markdown document and TextBundle to Metion now Supports moving and copying documents across work folder Mindmap compatibility support for MathJax formulas Full text search Fixed Some Problems some issues that will cause App crash

New Features Tag : as the meta declaration in the header like the title and date declaration declare tag multiple tags can be separated by commas Document Refer : the effect in the preview is not supported at present . If you use the keyboard you can use the shortcut key Command J to insert. Non keyboard access can be found in the shortcut bar of the soft keyboard slide to the right Document Refer can double check which documents are referenced and by which documents Compatible with Windows system that documents includes r n. Fixed Some Problems The iPad on iPadOS 13 will cause a crash if it is initially opened without loaded a document Menu bar is compressed when screen space is not enough Several other potential crashs on iOS 13
some bugs fixed
